title: Collision of Worlds
description: The thrilling conclusion to the Immortal saga! "The New World awoke to a roaring wind, light blazed from the mirror swallowing the planet..." The Guardians broke the rules. As punishment, Karla and Joseph are transported to a steam powered realm. Tehotep is now ruler of the empire. Karla is his concubine. Vampires roam the streets. Androids enforce a demon's will. And there is no way out. Except death... Cover art and design by Quinton Veal
author: Valjeanne Jeffers
